casebody.data:
Stephen A. JOHNSTON and John C. Sanford, Appellants, v. Roger N. BEACHY, Robert T. Fraley, and Stephen G. Rogers, Cross Appellants. Nos. 02-1054, 02-1070. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. Jan. 31, 2002.

ON MOTION

ORDER

Upon consideration of the parties’ joint motion to dismiss these appeals,

IT IS ORDERED THAT:

(1) The motion is granted.

(2) Each side shall bear its own costs.

(3) The court’s January 16, 2002 order is moot.
